page.title: 03FARMING IN AVON
page.content: {1)Livestock Farming. We went to Tunley Farm and had a look around.It is really a mixed farm.Mr. Jones has 2 dogs,2 donkeys,120 calves,10 pigs,2 horses and 135 cows.Mr.Jones gets up at 5.30 a.m.to milk the cows.He milks twice daily.It is a mixed farm of 500 acres,some of which are in our area.{ {2)Arable Farming. At Castle Farm,Mr.Perry grows barley,potatoes and kale.The barley was planted in March,the kale in June, as were the potatoes.He planted his seeds with a tractor with a drill attachment.He has been driving a tractor since he was thirteen. At busy times he employs three extra men to help him with the work. The animals he has on his farm affect the crops he grows.Castle Farm is a mixed farm.{By {David,Andrew,Claire,Lorraine & Amanda.
